This was good, however it felt rushed and they skipped through a lot of stuff. There was quite a few points where it felt like pages were missing and one page didn't really connect at all to the next page. For example, when he first starts training the grandmother, there is a random single page of him training his teacher at school but we never see her again? Like wtf?! Anyway, beyond that, I would have liked to actually see him train Yukari and see more of the sister.
All in all, it was good but I think it needed more pages or less characters to train. The story was very rushed, it seemed like they just forced the divorce suddenly out of nowhere just so they could time jump and wrap up the ending.
